name: SnackBar
desc: A lightweight message with an optional action which briefly displays at the bottom of the screen.

fields.name: content
fields.desc: The primary content of the snack bar.

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place the snack bar. This controls the size of the shadow below the snack bar.

fields.name: margin
fields.desc: Empty space to surround the snack bar.

fields.name: padding
fields.desc: The amount of padding to apply to the snack bar's content and optional action.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width of the snack bar.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The shape of the snack bar's [Material].

fields.name: hitTestBehavior
fields.desc: Defines how the snack bar area, including margin, will behave during hit testing.

fields.name: behavior
fields.desc: This defines the behavior and location of the snack bar.

fields.name: action
fields.desc: (optional) An action that the user can take based on the snack bar.

fields.name: actionOverflowThreshold
fields.desc: (optional) The percentage threshold for action widget's width before it overflows to a new line.

fields.name: showCloseIcon
fields.desc: (optional) Whether to include a "close" icon widget.

fields.name: closeIconColor
fields.desc: An optional color for the close icon, if [showCloseIcon] is true.

fields.name: duration
fields.desc: The amount of time the snack bar should be displayed.

fields.name: animation
fields.desc: The animation driving the entrance and exit of the snack bar.

fields.name: onVisible
fields.desc: Called the first time that the snackbar is visible within a [Scaffold].

fields.name: dismissDirection
fields.desc: The direction in which the SnackBar can be dismissed.
